mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WEATHER_INFO ( WEATHER_CHECK_TIME, SEQ, DAY_INFO, MORNING_RAIN, AFTERNOON_RAIN, HIGH_TEMP, LOW_TEMP, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT ) VALUES ( #{weather_check_time}, (SELECT IFNULL(MAX(A.SEQ),0)+1 FROM WEATHER_INFO A WHERE A.WEATHER_CHECK_TIME = #{weather_check_time}), #{day_info}, #{morning_rain}, #{afternoon_rain}, #{high_temp}, #{low_temp}, #{reg_id}, SYSDATE(), #{reg_id}, SYSDATE() )
mapper.select: SELECT WEATHER_CHECK_TIME, SEQ, DAY_INFO, MORNING_RAIN, AFTERNOON_RAIN, HIGH_TEMP, LOW_TEMP, REG_ID, REG_DT, CHG_ID, CHG_DT FROM WEATHER_INFO WHERE WEATHER_CHECK_TIME = #{weather_check_time}
